name: House Ways and Means
html_pattern: div.single-event > div.date-block (span.month, span.day, span.year) + div.info > a[title link]
sample_titles: Full Committee Hearing on Foreign Influence in American Non-profits: Unmasking Threats from Beijing and Beyond
Full Committee Hearing with Health Insurance CEOs
Work & Welfare Subcommittee Hearing on Strengthening the Child Support Enforcement Program
notes: WordPress-based; div.single-event with date-block spans and info div; paginated (9 pages); individual hearing URLs like /event/[slug]

name: House Financial Services
sample_titles: Hearing Entitled: Priced Out of the American Dream: Understanding the Policies Behind Rising Costs of Housing and Borrowing
Hearing Entitled: Building a Solid Foundation: Restoring Trust and Transparency in Public Housing Agencies
Hearing Entitled: Oversight of the Securities and Exchange Commission
notes: Noscript says 'Javascript must be enabled' but article.card-h-event elements ARE present in raw HTML with titles, dates, and links; 29 articles found; links to /calendar/EventSingle.aspx?EventID=NNNNNN

name: House Energy and Commerce
html_pattern: Next.js SSR with __NEXT_DATA__ JSON; no calendar items in raw HTML
notes: Next.js/React SPA; /hearings/ returns 404; /calendars returns 200 but calendar items are JS-rendered; __NEXT_DATA__ contains only category metadata, not calendar entries; would require headless browser or API discovery

name: House Budget
html_pattern: table > tr > td[title + link] + td[location] + td[date]; links to /hearing/[slug]
date_format: MM/DD/YY HH:MMA in table cells (e.g., '01/21/26 10:15AM'); also <time datetime='2026-01-21T10:15'>
sample_titles: Full Committee Hearing: HEARING NOTICE: Reverse the Curse: Skyrocketing Healthcare Costs
Full Committee Hearing: HEARING NOTICE: Member Day Hearing
Full Committee Hearing: Oversight of the Congressional Budget Office
notes: Clean table-based layout; 26 hearing rows; links to /hearing/[slug]; no testimony PDFs on listing page

name: House Appropriations
html_pattern: div.views-field.views-field-nothing > div.h3.mt-0.font-weight-bold > a[title link] + div.evo-hearing__field-evo-meeting-date > time[datetime]
sample_titles: Hearing: The Science of Reading
Oversight Hearing - Potential DHS Shutdown Impacts
Oversight Hearing - U.S. Department of Agriculture, Office of Inspector General
notes: Drupal-based (evo framework); /events/hearings/ redirects to /schedule/hearings; 12 entries with dates, titles, locations, and links; links to /schedule/hearings/[slug]

name: House Agriculture
html_pattern: No listing elements in raw HTML; JS-rendered calendar
notes: Legacy ASP.NET-style site; /hearings/ redirects to /calendar/?Timeframe=All; calendar content is JavaScript-rendered; requires headless browser

name: House Foreign Affairs
html_pattern: div.media.evo-media-object.mt-2.mb-4 > div.media-body > div.h5 > a[title link] + div.evo-hearing__field-evo-meeting-date > time[datetime]
sample_titles: South Asia: U.S. Foreign Policy in the Region
Weaponized Mass Migration: A Security Risk to Europe and the United States
Advancing Peace in DRC and Rwanda through President Trump's Deal-Making
notes: Drupal-based (evo framework); standard /hearings/ returns 404; correct path is /committee-activity/hearings/all; each entry has subcommittee info; links to /committee-activity/hearings/[slug]

name: House Science, Space, Technology
html_pattern: Multiple tables with headers [Date, Time, Title]; grouped by subcommittee sections
notes: Table-based listing grouped by subcommittee; links to Opening Statements; multiple small tables with Date/Time/Title headers; relatively few current hearings

name: House Small Business
html_pattern: No listing elements in raw HTML; JS-rendered calendar
notes: Legacy ASP.NET-style site; /hearings/ redirects to /calendar/list.aspx?EventTypeID=253 (404); /calendar/ returns 200 but content is JS-rendered; requires headless browser

name: House Transportation
html_pattern: No clear hearing listing pattern; page has navigation/footer content but no event entries in HTML
date_format: Month DD, YYYY visible in text but not in structured listing elements
notes: Legacy ASP.NET-style; /calendar/ returns 200 but calendar entries appear JS-rendered; only statement links visible in raw HTML, not hearing listings; /hearings/ returns 404

name: House Oversight
html_pattern: div.post.featured-post > div.category + div.title + div.excerpt; links to /hearing/[slug]; 10 per page with pagination
date_format: Dates embedded in link text (e.g., 'HearingDoing More with Less...February 5, 2026'); Month DD, YYYY (text)
sample_titles: Doing More with Less: Deleting Duplicative Programs
Housing Affordability: Saving the American Dream
Declassified MLK Records: What They Reveal and Why They Matter
notes: WordPress-based; div.post.featured-post entries with category/title/excerpt; dates in link text not structured spans; links to full /hearing/[slug] URLs; paginated; testimony PDFs on individual pages

name: House Judiciary
html_pattern: div.media.evo-media-object.mt-4.mb-4 > div.media-body > div.h3.mt-0.font-weight-bold > a[title link] + div.evo-hearing__field-evo-meeting-date > time[datetime]
sample_titles: Sharia-Free America: Why Political Islam & Sharia Law Are Incompatible with the U.S. Constitution
Oversight of the U.S Department of Justice
Europe's Threat to American Speech and Innovation: Part II
notes: Drupal-based (evo framework); /hearings/ returns 403; /calendar returns static page; best URL is /committee-activity/hearings; same evo-media-object pattern as Foreign Affairs but with mt-4 spacing; includes location info

name: House Armed Services
html_pattern: article.article-item > a[href to EventSingle.aspx] + time[datetime text]
sample_titles: Joint SPF/RDY Hearing: V-22 Osprey Program Update
FULL Committee Hearing: Reforming Defense Acquisition to Deliver Capability at the Speed of Relevance
Full Committee Markup: FY26 NDAA
notes: Noscript says 'Javascript must be enabled' but article.article-item elements ARE in raw HTML with titles, dates, links; links to EventSingle.aspx?EventID=NNNN; includes markups alongside hearings

name: House Education and Workforce
html_pattern: table > tr with hearing title cells; 104+ rows; titles in td elements with links
date_format: Month DD, YYYY in text within table cells
sample_titles: Work, Dignity, and Choice in Disability Employment
Building an AI-Ready America: Safer Workplaces Through Smarter Technology
Defending Faith and Families Against Government Overreach
notes: Noscript says 'Javascript must be enabled' but table content IS in raw HTML; /hearings/ redirects to this URL; 104 hearing entries in table format; very large dataset spanning multiple congresses

name: House Homeland Security
sample_titles: Oversight of the Department of Homeland Security: ICE, CBP, and USCIS
Surveying the Threat of Agroterrorism, Part II: Assessing Federal Government Efforts
notes: WordPress-based with Tribe Events calendar plugin; article elements with tribe-events classes; links to full /hearing/[slug] URLs; clean extractable structure

name: House Natural Resources
html_pattern: No listing elements in raw HTML; JS-rendered calendar
notes: Legacy ASP.NET-style; /hearings/ redirects to /calendar/list.aspx?EventTypeID=510 (404); /calendar/ returns 200 but calendar entries are JS-rendered; requires headless browser

name: House Veterans Affairs
html_pattern: article.calblocker > title text + date text; 10 articles found
date_format: Month DD, YYYY in text (e.g., dates embedded in article content)
sample_titles: Full Committee Markup
Full Committee Oversight Hearing
Joint Subcommittee on Technology Modernization and Subcommittee on Economic Opportunity Oversight Hearing
notes: Noscript says 'Javascript must be enabled' but article.calblocker elements ARE in raw HTML with titles and basic dates; includes markups alongside hearings; limited date structure

name: House Rules
html_pattern: h2 > a[title link to /media/announcement/[slug]] + div.field-content + time[datetime]; Drupal evo-default-content pattern
sample_titles: Meeting Announcement for February 10, 2026
Meeting Announcement For February 9, 2026
Meeting Announcement For February 2, 2026
notes: Drupal-based (evo framework); no /hearings/ or /calendar/ paths; meetings listed under /media/announcements; these are meeting announcements not traditional hearing listings; links to /media/announcement/[slug]

name: House Intelligence
html_pattern: Redirects to individual hearing event page, not a listing; no hearing listing URL found
date_format: Month DD, YYYY (text on individual page)
notes: WordPress-based; /hearing/ redirects to a single hearing event page (not a listing); /hearings/ returns 404; /calendar/ returns 404; no discoverable hearing listing URL; may require API or sitemap discovery
